values:
So I've had this account for I don't know how long, and I figured I should maybe post an entry - seeing as how that is,  ya know, the point of having an account.  I don't really do the whole journaling thing, (I find my life isn't interesting enough for it) and I'm also incapable of writing fan fiction, much to my despair, hence the complete lack of entries thus far.  See the only reason I have one of these things at all is because of kroki_refur, who insists on writing amazing fan fiction for my beloved Supernatural, and then friend locking some of it.  After reading all her unlocked fiction, obviously the only course of action was to sign up for my own account so I could become her friend, and read the rest.  So Refur, you don't know me at all, but this is all because of you.  You're just that amazing.  

Well I'm off to attempt carrot grilling.
